channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 01:24 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 01:24 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
